name: Griffin
description: Headquarters

name: Area S09 Tactical Command Center
description: The head of the griffin that commands its wings and claws.

name: Frontline Combat Team
description: The crème de la crème of Griffin T-Dolls – they are the beak of the griffin, piercing everything and leading it to victory.

name: Response Combat Team
description: These Griffin T-Dolls form the backbone of our forces – they are the plumage that shields the griffin from the dust.

name: Border Surveillance Corps
description: The most astute of Griffin T-Dolls – they are the sharp eyes of the griffin, watching its enemies from miles away.

name: General Support Team
description: The most inconspicuous force in Griffin – If you underestimate them...watch out for those razor-sharp claws.

name: Assimilated Forces
description: They aren't part of a griffin, but even the most valiant of beasts have friendly aid.

name: Integrated Logistic Department
description: The most down-to-earth of Griffin T-Dolls – they are the wings of the griffin, lifting its sturdy body and giving it the ability to soar.

name: T-Doll Club
description: The most mischievous of Griffin T-Dolls – they are the tail of the griffin, nimble, unpredictable, but never fail to bring joy and comfort.

name: Command Room
description: The source of all battle commands. The Commander's main workplace.

name: HQ Intelligence Center
description: The main intelligence center. A vault of Griffin's most valuable asset.

name: Data Room
description: The place where intelligence is screened and processed. Miss Kalina has spent most of her precious youth here.

name: Special Reception Lounge
description: Entry to this mysterious little room is forbidden for Griffin Dolls, and it seems uninhabited, but every now and then footsteps can be heard from it in the middle of the night…

name: Intelligence Center
description: A branch of the Frontline Combat Team – true elites understand the importance of intelligence.

name: Basecamp
description: The basecamp of the Frontline Combat Team. The final stop before an operation begins.

name: Depot
description: The depot of the Frontline Combat Team. Most of the things stored in here aren't meant for the public eye.

name: Intelligence Center
description: A branch of the Response Combat Team – so much intel is gathered here it could work nine Kalinas to death.

name: Basecamp
description: The basecamp of the Response Combat Team. The atmosphere isn't too cold and deadly here...in fact, it's quite laid-back.

name: Depot
description: The depot of the Response Combat Team. Unimaginable things are stored here – because it literally has EVERYTHING.

name: Intelligence Center
description: A branch of the Border Surveillance Corps – mainly specializing in producing topographical images and diagrams. Do you like maps?

name: Forward Basecamp
description: Forward Basecamp, where echoes can be heard – no matter where you are, we'll be right behind you.

name: Depot
description: The depot of the Border Surveillance Corps. Holy crap, you guys are even messier than the Response Combat Team!

name: Intelligence Center
description: A branch of the General Support Team – the branch we're most familiar with and the source of most intel missions.

name: Fairy Chamber
description: I repeat – those are not toys! Don't make me say that again!

name: Garage
description: A hangout for the HOCs. Probably the place that resembles a military camp the most…

name: Protocol Control Center
description: We don't know much about this stuff… Perhaps our enemies have more insight.

name: Special Training Ground
description: A new training ground especially built for the Assimilated Forces. They value their privacy.

name: Isolated Testing Ground
description: "What, you want to come with us?"

name: Specialized Factory
description: It isn't exactly special treatment… We just use different tech.

name: Cafe
description: Everyone likes a drink after a mission, but sometimes someone else comes along to fill in for Miss Springfield. I just hope I never run into such occasions.

name: DORM
description: "Commander… No more than three. We can't take care of any more."

name: Rescue Station
description: "Don't look at me! They said no more than three!"

name: Supply Warehouse
description: This is Griffin's largest as well as tidiest warehouse, managed by Miss Kalina herself.

name: Cafeteria
description: The most human-like feature of Tactical Dolls is that they never let good food go to waste – though the list of Dolls banned from the kitchen is getting longer and longer.

name: Secretary Office
description: Miss Kalina's assistants' office – What? So the Data Room isn't her office?

name: Club Activity Room
description: Dolls find leisure and entertainment here, but you can always see a few familiar faces in this room - "MDR, you're slacking off again!"

name: Banquet Hall
description: A big hall reserved for large-scale events. Several Dolls also hang out here in their free time – but no drinking competitions!
